title: 4 People Shot Outside Feltonville Club
content:
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — A man and 3 women were shot outside the Alounge Social Club in Feltonville, after an argument inside the bar.
It happened around 5:15 a.m., on Macalester Street, near East Hunting Park.
Officials say there was a fight between a man and a woman inside the club, and when the others got involved, they all were kicked out. That’s when authorities say, shots were fired.
All four were taken to local hospitals, and listed in stable condition.
